message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a one-time deal. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested but that price is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go that low. I can meet you in the middle at $11,500. What do you think?
